step_feedback.feedback: Focus on gently squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Try to keep your wrists and elbows more relaxed and aligned with your shoulders.
Good job on the shoulder movement! Continue to keep your wrists and elbows closer to your body and aligned with your shoulders for better form.
Excellent! You're doing great with the shoulder rolls. Remember to inhale deeply as you pull your shoulders back to maximize the benefit.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with your shoulder rolls! Keep focusing on squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Remember to breathe deeply as you move to help with lymphatic flow and oxygen.
